headline.main: Greater Effort Sought Here; English Leader Urges Speed and Unity for Defeat for Hitlerism

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: I venture to address this letter to you because, clearly enough, we have reached one of those periods of pause in the war in which a moral stocktaking is essential; and there is, I think, a real danger that the balance of forces may be wrongly estimated by a public which is still remote from the actual impact of conflict.
abstract: Seeks greater U S aid to Brit and USSR, lr
